original_title: Tyler, The Creator: Live at Lollapalooza 2021
overview: Tyler, the Creator's performs all-time favourites such as "Yonkers" and tracks in his new album 'Call Me If You Get Lost' alongside a presentation of IGOR and short conversations about his anxiety at Lollapalooza 2021, Chicago.
title: Tyler, The Creator: Live at Lollapalooza 2021
